description.english: Team up with a friend in multiplayer.
Craft and place a simple grill.
Craft and place a simple purifier.
Place a sail and a stationary anchor on the same raft.
Have 20 storages on the same raft.
Have 20 cropplots on the same raft.
Research everything in the research table.
Find the white board in the radio station.
Reach a depth of 100 meters below the surface.
Cook a meal by following a recipe.
Why is there a photo behind the toolboard??
Find all notes on the Radio Tower!
Find all notes on Caravan Town!
Travel 50 meters on a zipline without disjointing.
Travel 100 meters with the zipline tool.
Travel 500 meters with the zipline tool.
Travel 1500 meters with the zipline tool.
Find the secret behind the boxes.
Play a note on an instrument.
Learn all crafting recipes from packages.
Slay the boss at Varuna Point.
Purchase an item at a trading post.
Reach tier 2 in the trading post.
Reach tier 3 in the trading post.
Have all buffs from meals and drinks active on you at the same time.
Drive a snowmobile into the sea.
Locate all Grabber caches on Varuna Point.
Find all notes in Varuna Point.
